com.tractrac.subscription.lib.api.control

Interface IControlsListener

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ISubscriberListener

    public interface IControlsListener
extends ISubscriberListener

    This listener is used to receive events related with the control list. It is used at a IEventSubscriber level: it means that it is not necessary to be subscribed to an individual race to receive its events.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addControl(long timestamp, IControl control)
      A new control has been added to the event.
      void deleteControl(long timestamp, java.util.UUID controlId)
      A control has been removed from the event
      void updateControl(long timestamp, IControl control)
      This event is thrown when a control is updated.

    • Method Detail

      • updateControl

        void updateControl(long timestamp,
                   IControl control)
        This event is thrown when a control is updated. I means that any of its static attributes have changed.
        Parameters:
        timestamp - the time stamp when the message was generated
        control - the control that has been updated.

      • addControl

        void addControl(long timestamp,
                IControl control)
        A new control has been added to the event.
        Parameters:
        timestamp - the time stamp when the message was generated
        control - the added control

      • deleteControl

        void deleteControl(long timestamp,
                   java.util.UUID controlId)
        A control has been removed from the event
        Parameters:
        timestamp - the time stamp when the message was generated
        controlId - the deleted control identifier
